title: HTTP Header Harden
description:
The portal allows clickjacking and insecure redirects.

Objective: Verify and add proper HTTP security headers on the portal to prevent framing and enforce HTTPS.
dialogue: Mira: "I heard the portal is missing some important security headers. That could be risky!"
Mira: "Can you help me check and add the right headers to keep users safe?"
hints: Check for X-Frame-Options, CSP, HSTS in responses.
